ED_Title: Observer status  for the International Trade Union Confederation in the General Assembly
ED_DecisionText: At its 45th plenary meeting, on 15 December 2020, the General Assembly, on the recommendation of the Sixth Committee (A/75/446, para. 7),  decided to defer a decision on the request for observer status for the International Trade Union Confederation in the Assembly  until the seventy-sixth session of the Assembly.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
